charges.charge_description: 21:841A=ND.F DISTRIBUTE COCAINE BASE AND COCAINE, SCHEDULE II NARCOTIC (2-3)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to custody of US Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 46 months. This term consists of terms of 46 months on each of counts 2 and 3, to be served concurrently. Defendant shall surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by the Bureau of Prisons as notified by the US Marshal. Upon release from prison, defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 3 years. This term consists of terms of 3 years on each of counts 2 and 3, to run concurrently. Defendant to comply with standard conditions of supervision and special conditions of supervision. Defendant ordered to pay special assessment of $100 on each of counts 2 and 3, for a total of $200. Defendant ordered to pay fine of $5,000 on each of counts 2 and 3, for a total fine of $10,000. (2-3)

charges.charge_disposition: Counts one and four are dismissed on the motion of the United States. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Counts one and four are dismissed on the motion of the United States. (4)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) Possession with the intent to distribute a quantity of a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of cocaine base, a Shedule II narcotic controlled substance drug [4:96-m-72]
